headline: Zimmer Biomet Holdings (NYSE:ZBH) Q1 Earnings Rise, Revises 2025 Revenue Guidance Upward
summary: Zimmer Biomet Holdings (NYSE:ZBH) recently reported solid financial performance, with increased sales and net income for the first quarter of 2025, along with a raised earnings guidance for the year. Despite these positive results, the company's stock price fell 11% over the past week. This decline came amid a broader market downturn, with stocks slipping as investors awaited news on tariffs and Federal Reserve decisions. While Zimmer Biomet's financial updates were strong, they were not...
